entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character in the story, a wizard who is trying to defeat Lord Voldemort.

entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, a dark wizard who created Horcruxes to become immortal.

entities.name: horcruxes
entities.description: Objects that contain pieces of Voldemort's soul, making him immortal.

relationships.description: Harry Potter is trying to defeat Lord Voldemort.
Harry Potter needs to find and destroy the Horcruxes to defeat Voldemort.
Lord Voldemort created the Horcruxes to become immortal.
